Actions.Name: Add or subtract from time or dates
Actions.Description: Manipulate datetime by adding or subtracting values.

Actions.Name: Calculate average
Actions.Description: Calculates the average value of a given key.

Actions.Name: Check if array contain a value
Actions.Description: Determines whether the array contains a given item.

Actions.Name: Chunk an array
Actions.Description: Break an array down into chunks.

Actions.Name: Combine array
Actions.Description: Combine the keys of one array with the values of another array.

Actions.Name: Combine multiple PDF files
Actions.Description: Combine multiple PDF files into one.

Actions.Name: Convert a PDF file to text
Actions.Description: Converts a PDF file to text.

Actions.Name: Convert a string to a datetime object
Actions.Description: Transform a string to a valid datetime format.

Actions.Name: Filter an array for false values
Actions.Description: This action removes false entries from an array.

Actions.Name: Find difference between arrays
Actions.Description: This action compares an array against another array.

Actions.Name: Find duplicates in arrays
Actions.Description: This action retrieves and returns duplicate values from an array.

Actions.Name: Find values from a string based on a regular expression
Actions.Description: Find one or more values in a string.

Actions.Name: First Where within an array
Actions.Description: This action returns the first element in an array with the given key / value pair.

Actions.Name: Flatten an array
Actions.Description: This action flattens a multi-dimensional array into a single dimension array.

Actions.Name: Get PDF metadata information
Actions.Description: Get metadata from a PDF file.

Actions.Name: Get unique items in an array
Actions.Description: The action returns all of the unique items in an array.

Actions.Name: Group By an array key
Actions.Description: This action groups an array's items by a given key.

Actions.Name: Perform OCR on a scanned PDF or image file
Actions.Description: Replaces a string with another word.

Actions.Name: Remove item from array
Actions.Description: Removes an item from an array by its key value.

Actions.Name: Replace text in string
Actions.Description: Replace one or more words with another word.

Actions.Name: Replace text in string based on a regular expression
Actions.Description: Replace one or more words with another word, based on a regular expression.

Actions.Name: Set password on a PDF file
Actions.Description: Dynamically sets a custom password on a PDF file.

Actions.Name: Sort an array
Actions.Description: Sort an array from high to low or from descending to ascending.
